title: Episode 127: A Farewell to Arms! Pirates and Different Ideas of Justice! - Blog Review
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A detailed review of Episode 127 discussing the aftermath of the high-intensity episode 126, focusing on character development for Smoker, Tashigi, and the debut of Hina. Analyzes themes of justice and the moral struggles of the Marine characters.

title: The End Of Alabasta: Episodes 122-130
author: One Piece Podcast
description: Discussion of the end of the Alabasta arc covering episodes 122-130, including Episode 127. The hosts discuss iconic One Piece moments while critiquing pacing issues in this section of the arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for episodes 122-130 of the Alabasta arc

author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 127 with plot summary, character information, trivia, and production details.
